title: MD
biography: V. S. Natarajan was an Indian career banker who served as the 9th Chairman of State Bank of India.
aiSummary: V. S. Natarajan is a dementia research specialist with an H-index of 32 at Geriatric Medicine (Member). Has been published in The Lancet Digital Health, JAMA Ophthalmology, Investigative Ophthalmology & Visual Science. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
